attributes.action: Allow nut allergy sufferers into the armed forces
attributes.additional_details: If the government catered for nut allergy sufferers they would have more active duty personnel keeping the country safe, and when we are told as a society that you can achieve anything you put your mind to it’s simply not correct as proven by cases like this.
attributes.background: If the government caters food for religions and vegetarians which is a lifestyle choice why can’t they do it for nut allergy sufferers which isn’t a choice, providing they sign a disclaimer that if they eat a nut it is not the government’s responsibility?
